name: oh-i-use
description: Developing Javascript web apps can be convoluted. Become that bleeding edge dev with the coolest sounding tech stack made from _randomly generated fake tool names_.

scripts.build: npm run vendor && babel src --out-dir dist
scripts.watch: npm run vendor && babel src --watch --out-dir dist --source-maps inline
scripts.vendor: mkdir -p ./vendor ./vendor/css ./vendor/js ./dist ./dist/favicon && cp -R ./src/favicon ./dist && cp -R ./node_modules/skeleton-css/css/ ./vendor/css && cp ./node_modules/vue/dist/vue.min.js ./vendor/js/vue.min.js && cp ./node_modules/whatwg-fetch/fetch.js ./vendor/js/fetch.js && cp ./node_modules/marked/marked.min.js ./vendor/js/marked.min.js

author: Joe Wroten <sharpshark28@gmail.com>
